attributes.action: Suspend the English Premier League 19/20 - Health over football the priority.
attributes.background: The transmission of the virus would be dramatically increased due to the volume of fans coming into contact before/during/after games...the knock on effect needs no further explanation. We ask that the Government take the lead on this, potentially, deadly issue.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. In any case, the Premier League and other fixtures have now been postponed.
